sources.title: Zero Town | ABSURDIST COMEDY
sources.description:
An absurdist comedy by Karen Shakhnazarov.

Engineer Varakin comes from Moscow to a small town on business. He needs to find out why the local factory stopped supplying spare parts. However, the first thing he sees at the factory is a completely naked secretary at the Directorâ€™s reception. But no one else seems fazed by this embarrassing circumstance. Every day the engineer faces situations that are becoming increasingly more bizarre. On top of all that, Varakin finds out that cannot leave the town.

Year of production: 1988

Directed by: Karen Shakhnazarov 
Written by: Alexander Borodyansky, Karen Shakhnazarov 
Director of photography: Nikolai Nemolyaev 
Production designer: Lyudmila Kusakova
Music: Eduard Artemyev 
Starring: Leonid Filatov, Oleg Basilashvili, Yevgeny Evstigneev, Vladimir Menshov, Pyotr Scherbakov, Armen Djigarkhanyan, Alexey Zharkov

#comedy_of_the_absurd #FullMoviesWithEngSubs
